means: 兜在马尾下的皮带，马屁股，臀部

sentence.Network_en: Marriage rides upon the saddle and repentance upon the crupper.
sentence.Network_cn: 快马加鞭奔婚礼,下得马鞍悔已迟.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French cropiere, related to croupe (see croup). Compare with croupier

means.word_mean: 1. a strap from the back of a saddle passing under the horse's tail; prevents saddle from slipping forward
